pages.text: This is the GUI of the Shop block

1: Buy/Sell toggle. Click to change between buy and sell mode. The pressed button shows what mode the Shop is currently on.$(br)2: Search box. Type an item name to search for it, if the shop is too large. (Hint: you can use your scrolling wheel to see more items!)$(br)3: Account Balance.$(br)4: Buy/Sell area. Click to buy or sell the item. Press Shift for exact number, Control/Alt to buy 16 at a time, and both for 64.

5: Current Bank Account. Shows the current bank account selected for the Shop.$(br)6: Change account button. Click to change the current bank account selected.$(br)7: Sets current account as new default when you open a shop or place a seller/buyer.
